short_summary: TBIPS - Qualified Resources for SAP Solutions
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
IT Specialized Services: S/4HANA and SAP/STAR Solution - Amendment 001

## Announcement Reference
 Solicitation Number: 10232290
 Amendment Number: 2
 Reference Number: CB-955-69439354

## Tender Details
* **Publication Date**: April 23, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 14, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2025

## Tender Description
The Canadian Heritage (Patrimoine canadien) is seeking to acquire Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply. The objective is to secure resources with expertise in SAP best practices for various technologies, including SAP ECC, S/4HANA, SAP Solution Manager, SAP ABAP, and WebDynpro, to support the maintenance and configuration of the SAP STAR solution, implement key Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) processes, and onboarding of new Departments, Agencies, or crown corporations to the existing and future solution.

## Contract Duration
The successful bidder(s) will be awarded a contract valid from the date of Contract award until May 31, 2025, plus three (3) one-year irrevocable options allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract.

## Tender Details in French
* **Date de publication**: 23 avril 2024
* **Date de clôture**: 14 mai 2024, 14 heures, HAE
* **Date de début du contrat**: 1er juin 2024
* **Date de fin du contrat**: 31 mai 2025

## Resources
* **Contracting Entity**: Canadian Heritage
* **Contact Information**:
  + Name: Nicole Sabourin
  + Email: contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca
  + Phone: 819271-7204

## Requirements and Evaluation Criteria
*  The tender shall be evaluated on a combined score based on technical merits and price.
*  The bid solicitation is being issued to satisfy the requirement of Canadian Heritage (PCH) for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply.
